{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Wikipedia editing {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Wikipedia editing Wikipedia is a wiki, meaning anyone can edit nearly any page and improve articles immediately. You do not need to register to do this, and anyone who has edited is known as a Wikipedian or editor. Small edits add up, and every editor can be proud to have made Wikipedia better for all. There are two editing interfaces: the new VisualEditor (VE) and classic wiki markup editing (wikitext). Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help:Editing)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
